title.rendered: 9 Brilliant Ways to Transform Your Backyard: Eldorado Artisan Infinite Fire Bowl

content.rendered:
Luxe Interiors + Design featured the Eldorado Artisan Infinite Fire Bowl in its May/June issue as one of 9 Brilliant Ways to Transform Your Backyard. The article states, “While the materials experts at Eldorado Stone have long been celebrated for their beautiful natural and manufactured architectural veneers, the company’s commitment to creating memorable spaces doesn’t end with façades or fireplace surrounds. One of their more recent entries, a collection of handcrafted fire bowls—like the Infinite Artisan fire bowl shown here—speaks to stone’s versatility, as the material does more than bring texture in construction applications; it brings texture to life, creating compulsively communal gathering spots especially tailored for s’mores lovers.”

The feature can be found in THE REPORT section of the magazine. Luxe Interiors + Design showcases luxury residential architecture, design, interiors and products, and serves as an idea book and resource of fine architectural design, interiors and trends.

See more details on the Infinite Artisan Fire Bowl here.
